spec: ToolTip on Activity %m.activity   Set to %m.view  Position %b   Text %s

name: Fire Design ui#1
spec: Style Linear Ui  on view%m.view corner %d shadow %d  ripple effect %m.color colour %m.color

name: Fire Design ui#2
spec: Gradient Design  on view %m.view  cornar %d shadow %d Gradient colour 1 %m.color  colour 2 %m.color  ripple effect colour %m.color

name: Fire Design ui#3
spec: Stroke Design on %m.view set stroke board colour %m.color set stroke board radius %d set view colour %m.color set ripple colour %m.color  set Shadow %d set cornar %d
